doctor.name: Dr. Khair Ahmed Choudhury
doctor.info: Dr. Khair Ahmed Choudhury is a Eye Specialist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, MS (EYE), ICO, FRCS (EDINBURGH) FRCS (GLASGOW). He is a Professor, Ophthalmology at National Institute of Ophthalmology & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Khair Ahmed Choudhury at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet is 5pm to 10pm (Thursday) & 9am to 3pm (Friday).
